common.voucherQuote: Please enter voucher code if you have one

main.subtitle: Step into the game with top-tier Valorant accounts — variety, quality, and trust in one place

filter.tryChangingFilters: Try adjusting your filters or search criteria

payment.enterAmount: Enter the amount you want to add to your account
payment.error: Please enter a valid amount greater than 10000.
payment.success: Your payment has been successfully confirmed, pls waiting for admin to verify!

notes.attention: Attention: Only click the "Confirm Payment" button after your transfer has been successfully completed. (Remember to take a screenshot of your transaction).
notes.minimumAmount: Minimum Amount: The transfer amount must be at least 10,000 VND. Otherwise, the system will flag it as spam and the funds will NOT be credited to your account.
notes.transactionContent: Transaction Content: Do NOT edit the transfer note/content field when scanning the QR code.
notes.supportedWallets: Supported Wallets: All e-wallets, such as MOMO, ZALO PAY, VIETTEL MONEY, etc., are supported.
notes.verification: Verification: Double-check that your transaction details match the payment information provided above (especially the Transfer Content).
notes.processingTime: Processing Time: After clicking "Confirm Payment," please wait for the system to finish loading (approx. 1–3 minutes).
notes.errorHandling: Error Handling: If you receive a "System Busy" or "Transaction Not Found" error, wait 5 minutes, refresh the page, and click "Confirm" again. Please repeat this process up to 3 times. If the funds are still not credited, contact our Page.
notes.support: Support: If you encounter any issues, please message our FanPage or Group. Provide your account information and a screenshot of your payment history.

faqItems.question: What is a warranty account?
faqItems.answer: A warranty account is an account guaranteed 100% not to be locked. If the account is locked or encounters issues, the shop will support account replacement or full refund according to the shop's warranty policy.

faqItems.question: What is the shop's warranty policy?
faqItems.answer: The shop provides warranty for all accounts within 30 days. If the account encounters any issues during this period (locked, problems), customers can contact the shop for account replacement or immediate refund.

faqItems.question: Does the shop buy back accounts?
faqItems.answer: Yes, the shop buys back accounts at competitive prices. Please contact support for more details about buyback rates and conditions.

faqItems.question: How to change password?
faqItems.answer: You can change your password in the user settings. Go to Profile > Settings > Change Password and follow the instructions.

faqItems.question: What payment methods are accepted?
faqItems.answer: We accept multiple payment methods including bank transfer, e-wallets, and cryptocurrency. Choose your preferred method during checkout.

faqItems.question: How long does delivery take?
faqItems.answer: Most accounts are delivered instantly after payment confirmation. For some special accounts, delivery may take 1-24 hours.
